name: Drider
description: A terrifying blend of dark elf and giant spider with eight legs and fangs, possessing drow intelligence and magic.
memorable: Driders are known to revel in the suffering of their foes, utilizing web-based tactics for ambush.
goals: To serve the dark goddess Lolth, often found weaving webs and leading hunts in the Underdark.
relations: Servants of Lolth, related to drow and spiders.
environment: Typically found in the dimly lit caverns of the Underdark.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances stealth and attack capabilities; resistant to poison damage.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, suffering disadvantages on attacks and perception checks.
attacks: Multiattack with claws, bite, longsword, and longbow, capable of dealing poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Web Walker allows for unrestricted movement over webs, combined with sunlight sensitivity weaknesses.
senses: Has a passive perception of 16, excels in ambush tactics with heightened awareness.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Survival, making it effective in wilderness and ambush settings.
additional_information: Possesses the Fey Ancestry trait granting resistance to being charmed.
Can climb upside down on ceilings without penalty.
Utilizes webbing in combat to restrain enemies.
Can innately cast darkness and faerie fire once per day.
Possesses a venomous bite that enhances lethality.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like darkness and faerie fire using innate abilities.
test_queries: dark elf spider hybrid of the Underdark
creature that thrives in darkness and uses webs
